NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 DAZ: My love, is there a voyager stone to Timber Hearth in the Deep Storm Station? I believe I will need some assistance in the task of locating the stowaways within the Sanctuary. 2 1 CASSAVA: Could you voyage here to the Deep Storm Station to check, Daz? My apologies, I am preparing to start another test at the moment. 3 2 DAZ: Ah, here it is! It was in the Deep Storm Station after all. Almost as if.. fate wanted you to join me in my task as well? 4 3 CASSAVA: Hah! Your attempts to subtly persuade me to join you have given way, I see. But.. I do not feel I can allow myself such joy right now, Daz. 5 4 DAZ: My love.. The failure of the Ash Twin Project was not your fault. We must not be weighed by failure: we can only keep learning from our experiences, and trying new solutions! 6 4 DAZ: Poke, Pye and Clary are already exploring the newly arrived comet at this very moment. Imagine what we may 7 6 CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? 8 7 CASSAVA: Daz? What's wrong? Daz? WorkshopTop EX4 7 CONV R4 7
